titles: The fallacy of infants baptisme discovered. Or, Five arguments, to prove that infants ought not to be baptized. Delivered in private by Captain Hobson, who should that day (with Master Knowls, and some others;) have discussed the thing in publike with Master Callamy, and Master Cranford, &c. And now published for the benefit of those that seeke the truth in love.
author: Hobson, Paul.
S. S.
date: Printed in the yeer of discoveries. 1645.
notes: Editor's note "To the courteous reader" signed: S.S.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
